product_name: Timbuk2 Goody Bento Box Top Tube Bag
long_description: The small Timbuk2 Goody Bento Box top tube bag stashes your energy foods and a few other small items for easy access while you ride your bike. Rip-and-stick straps make it easy to attach the Goody Bento Box to your top tube where it's accessible while you ride. Made of finely woven ballistic nylon with a waterproof thermoplastic urethane liner to help keep your goodies dry. Zippered opening to main compartment. Separate external stretch pocket.
short_description: The small Timbuk2 Goody Bento Box top tube bag stashes your energy foods and a few other small items for easy access while you ride your bike.
